item.description:
here it is, what you all have been waiting for (those who recall you are in the group I should say)!!

After living in a spacious home, meaning to move into a smaller nice apartment which fell through 2 days before move day (seriously), then hotel living, going to Ohio to save some money to stay with family- the day has come- our own bought house (ok, the bank owns most of it, but whatever)....

it's a small old place, old meaning built in 1716...low ceilings (tall people you have been warned)..

but shall we all just play our hearts out, bring your favorite drink (we have a bar in the house, not massive but quaint with it's own mini fridge) and have a BBQ???

I will throw on some meat and fake meat burgers for the vegetarians amongst us...

come one come all. Ok, I need to limit, so not all all. You know what I'm saying.
I need more coffee now- see you in August.

YIPPEE

group.name: The North of Boston Euchre Meetup

item.name: FINALLY SOME EUCHRE!!!
